leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 计算科学方法论与数值计算生态
leaf_cluster.typical_objects: 稀疏矩阵/算子, 网格与离散系统, PDE/ODE, 误差/收敛数据
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 离散化→求解→误差/稳定性→加速→验证→可复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 数值库/求解器框架 + 自动微分/可微分计算 + HPC

unit.unit_name: 时间积分与多尺度数值方法（ODE/DAE/SDE）
unit.coverage_tools: stiff integrators、DAE、事件处理、多速率、多步法

queries: [WEB] differential algebraic equations DAE solver github
[WEB] stochastic differential equations SDE numerical methods github
[WEB] high order time stepping schemes github

tools.name: GAS
tools.one_line_profile: Generalized Adversarial Solver for improving discretization of diffusion ODEs
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of the Generalized Adversarial Solver (GAS) method, designed to improve the discretization quality of Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs) within diffusion models.

tools.name: jaxkineticmodel
tools.one_line_profile: Systems biology modeling and simulation library using JAX/Diffrax
tools.detailed_description: A library for building, simulating, and training kinetic models in systems biology, leveraging the JAX ecosystem and Diffrax for efficient differential equation solving.

tools.name: eqsolver
tools.one_line_profile: Rust library for numerical equation solving and integration
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library designed for numerical analysis tasks, including equation solving, optimization, and numerical integration, suitable for scientific computing applications.

tools.name: EPD
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel gradient distillation for fast ODE solvers in diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the EPD method (Distilling Parallel Gradients) to accelerate ODE solvers for diffusion models, presented at ICCV 2025.

tools.name: ode
tools.one_line_profile: Ordinary differential equation solving library in Go
tools.detailed_description: A library for solving ordinary differential equations (ODEs) implemented in the Go programming language, providing standard numerical methods.

tools.name: FATODE
tools.one_line_profile: Fortran library for ODE integration with sensitivity analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran library for the integration of ordinary differential equations (ODEs) capable of performing direct and adjoint sensitivity analysis, developed by the Computational Science Laboratory.

tools.name: Integreat
tools.one_line_profile: Mathematica paclet for analyzing numerical integration methods
tools.detailed_description: A Mathematica paclet designed for deriving and analyzing Runge–Kutta, linear multistep, and general linear methods for numerical integration.

tools.name: Arrhenius.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable reacting flow modeling software
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable software package for modeling reacting flows and combustion, built in Julia, enabling gradient-based optimization and analysis of chemical kinetics.

tools.name: torchdyn
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch library for neural differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A dedicated PyTorch library for neural ordinary differential equations (Neural ODEs), implicit models, and related numerical methods for deep learning and scientific computing.

tools.name: Num_Func
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB numerical analysis toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive numerical analysis toolbox for MATLAB, including modules for interpolation, fitting, numerical integration, and solving linear/nonlinear equations and ODEs.

tools.name: pinn-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for solving differential equations (PINNs)
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library for solving partial and ordinary differential equations using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs).

tools.name: quadrature
tools.one_line_profile: Fast numerical integration library for Rust
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library providing fast numerical integration (quadrature) algorithms for scientific computing.

tools.name: Massively-Parallel-GPU-ODE-Solver
tools.one_line_profile: GPU accelerated integrator for large systems of ODEs
tools.detailed_description: A CUDA-based solver designed for the massively parallel integration of large numbers of independent ordinary differential equation systems.

tools.name: PinnDE
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for solving differential equations using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs)
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to solve differential equations via physics-informed neural networks (PINNs) and deep operator networks, bridging deep learning with numerical analysis.

tools.name: scipy_dae
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of differential algebraic equation (DAE) solvers
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing solvers for differential algebraic equations (DAEs), intended to complement the SciPy ecosystem with specialized DAE integration capabilities.

tools.name: GeometricIntegrators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric numerical integration library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library dedicated to geometric numerical integration, providing methods that preserve geometric properties of differential equations, such as symplecticity and energy conservation.

tools.name: MeshIntegrals.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical integration over geometry domains in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for performing numerical integration over complex geometry domains defined by Meshes.jl, supporting various quadrature rules.

tools.name: NumericalIntegration.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Basic numerical integration routines for presampled data in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library providing simple and efficient numerical integration methods (like Trapezoidal and Simpson's rules) for data that has already been sampled.

tools.name: QuadGK.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive 1D numerical Gauss–Kronrod integration in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance Julia library for adaptive 1D numerical integration using Gauss-Kronrod rules, capable of handling singularities and infinite intervals.

tools.name: Measurements.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Error propagation calculator and library for physical measurements in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for performing arithmetic and numerical operations (including integration) on numbers with uncertainties, automatically handling error propagation.

tools.name: dpm-solver
tools.one_line_profile: Fast ODE solver for Diffusion Probabilistic Model sampling
tools.detailed_description: A dedicated high-order ODE solver designed to accelerate the sampling process of diffusion probabilistic models, significantly reducing the number of steps required for generation.

tools.name: RungeKuttaCpp
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of explicit Runge-Kutta integrators in C++
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library providing a collection of explicit Runge-Kutta methods for solving ordinary differential equations, focusing on performance and ease of integration.

tools.name: scikit-sundae
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings to SUNDIALS differential algebraic equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface to the SUNDIALS suite of non-linear and differential/algebraic equation solvers, developed by NREL for scientific simulation tasks.

tools.name: neurodiffeq
tools.one_line_profile: Library for solving differential equations using neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library for solving ordinary and partial differential equations (ODEs/PDEs) using neural networks, facilitating scientific machine learning research.

tools.name: NumbaQuadpack
tools.one_line_profile: Numba-compatible Python wrapper for Quadpack numerical integration
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the Quadpack Fortran library that allows numerical integration routines to be called from within Numba-compiled functions for high performance.

tools.name: numbalsoda
tools.one_line_profile: Numba-compatible Python wrapper for LSODA ODE solver
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the LSODA ODE solver (from ODEPACK) that enables solving differential equations efficiently within Numba-compiled code.

tools.name: CompEcon
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for computational economics and numerical methods
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive MATLAB toolbox providing numerical solvers for rootfinding, optimization, integration, and differential equations, specifically tailored for computational economics and finance applications.

tools.name: PDLSM-FEM_mpi
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel solver for coupled Peridynamics and Finite Element Method
tools.detailed_description: A parallel C++ solver implementing the coupled Peridynamics Least Squares Minimization and Finite Element Method (PDLSM-FEM) for 2D and 3D structural analysis.

tools.name: differential-equations
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance Rust library for solving differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library designed for high-performance numerical solution of differential equations, offering various integration schemes.

tools.name: FractionalCalculus.jl
tools.one_line_profile: High performance numerical fractional calculus computing library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package dedicated to comprehensive and high-precision numerical fractional calculus computing, providing support for fractional differentiation and integration operations.

tools.name: FractionalDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical solvers for fractional differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for solving Fractional Differential Equations (FDEs) using high-performance numerical methods, supporting systems of FDEs and multi-term problems.

tools.name: Catalyst.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical reaction network modeling interface for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A domain-specific language and interface for defining chemical reaction networks and systems biology models, capable of generating high-performance O(1) solvers and GPU-parallelized simulations within the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: DASKR.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia interface to the DASKR differential-algebraic system solver
tools.detailed_description: Provides an interface to the DASKR solver (Fortran) for solving differential-algebraic equations (DAEs) with root finding, integrated into the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: DASSL.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Solver for stiff differential algebraic equations (DAE)
tools.detailed_description: A Julia implementation or interface for solving stiff differential-algebraic equations (DAEs) using variable step-size backwards differentiation formulas (BDF).

tools.name: DelayDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Solvers for delay differential equations (DDEs)
tools.detailed_description: A component of the SciML ecosystem providing solvers for retarded and neutral delay differential equations (DDEs), as well as differential-algebraic equations with delays.

tools.name: DiffEqApproxFun.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Bridge between ApproxFun.jl and DifferentialEquations.jl for spectral discretizations
tools.detailed_description: Facilitates the interaction between ApproxFun.jl (function approximation) and DifferentialEquations.jl to enable pseudospectral partial differential equation discretizations.

tools.name: DiffEqBase.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Base library for defining differential equation problems in SciML
tools.detailed_description: The core library defining shared types, abstract interfaces, and common functionality for the DifferentialEquations.jl and SciML ecosystem, enabling interoperability between solvers and problem definitions.

tools.name: DiffEqCallbacks.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Callback library for differential equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: Provides a collection of callbacks for handling events, discontinuities, and hybrid systems within the DifferentialEquations.jl ecosystem.

tools.name: DiffEqFlux.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific Machine Learning (SciML) and Neural Differential Equations
tools.detailed_description: A library for fusing neural networks with differential equations, enabling Neural ODEs, SDEs, DAEs, and physics-informed machine learning (PINNs) with O(1) backpropagation and GPU support.

tools.name: DiffEqGPU.jl
tools.one_line_profile: GPU acceleration for DifferentialEquations.jl
tools.detailed_description: Provides routines and infrastructure to accelerate differential equation solvers on GPUs using CUDA, AMDROCm, and other backends within the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: DiffEqNoiseProcess.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Noise process definitions for stochastic differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A library defining various noise processes (e.g., Wiener process, Brownian motion) for use in stochastic differential equation (SDE) simulations.

tools.name: DiffEqPhysics.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed differential equation modeling tools
tools.detailed_description: A library for constructing differential equations from physical principles (e.g., Hamiltonian, Lagrangian mechanics) for use in scientific machine learning and simulation.

tools.name: DiffEqProblemLibrary.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Library of differential equation problems for benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A collection of pre-defined differential equation problems (ODEs, SDEs, DAEs) used for testing, benchmarking, and validating solvers in the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: DifferentialEquations.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive suite for solving differential equations in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A meta-package and primary entry point for the SciML ecosystem, providing high-performance solvers for ODEs, SDEs, DAEs, DDEs, and more, with support for stiff equations, events, and high-order methods.

tools.name: IRKGaussLegendre.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Implicit Runge-Kutta Gauss-Legendre solver
tools.detailed_description: Implements the 16th order Implicit Runge-Kutta Gauss-Legendre method for high-precision integration of differential equations.

tools.name: Integrals.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Common interface for numerical integration and quadrature
tools.detailed_description: Provides a unified interface for various numerical integration (quadrature) libraries in Julia, supporting multidimensional and high-performance integration tasks.

tools.name: NeuralPDE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural Network (PINN) solvers
tools.detailed_description: A library for solving Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) and other neural network-based methods within the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: ODE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Basic Ordinary Differential Equation solvers (Deprecated)
tools.detailed_description: A legacy library providing basic ODE solvers. It is largely deprecated in favor of OrdinaryDiffEq.jl and DifferentialEquations.jl but remains a historical reference.

tools.name: OrdinaryDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance ODE and DAE solvers for Julia
tools.detailed_description: The primary component of DifferentialEquations.jl containing a vast collection of high-performance solvers for Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs) and Differential-Algebraic Equations (DAEs), including stiff and non-stiff methods.

tools.name: OrdinaryDiffEqOperatorSplitting.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Operator splitting methods for ODEs and DAEs
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for handling and solving split formulations of ODE and DAE problems, enabling operator splitting strategies for complex multi-physics simulations.

tools.name: PDESystemLibrary.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Library of Partial Differential Equation systems
tools.detailed_description: A collection of pre-defined systems of Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) implemented using ModelingToolkit.jl, serving as a dataset for testing and benchmarking PDE solvers.

tools.name: RootedTrees.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Rooted trees functionality for Runge-Kutta order conditions
tools.detailed_description: A library for generating and manipulating rooted trees to derive order conditions for Runge-Kutta methods, aiding in the theoretical development and analysis of numerical integrators.

tools.name: SciMLBenchmarks.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for scientific machine learning and equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive suite of benchmarks comparing the performance of various differential equation solvers and SciML tools across Julia, Python, MATLAB, and R.

tools.name: SteadyStateDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Solvers for steady state differential equations
tools.detailed_description: Provides methods for finding the steady-state solutions of differential equations (equilibrium points) within the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: StochasticDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Solvers for stochastic differential equations (SDEs)
tools.detailed_description: A library of high-performance solvers for Stochastic Differential Equations (SDEs), supporting Ito and Stratonovich interpretations and various noise processes.

tools.name: Sundials.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia interface to the Sundials solver suite
tools.detailed_description: Provides a Julia interface to the SUNDIALS C library, giving access to robust solvers like CVODE (ODEs), IDA (DAEs), and KINSOL (nonlinear systems).

tools.name: SymbolicNumericIntegration.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Symbolic-numeric integration solver
tools.detailed_description: A package for solving integrals using a combination of symbolic and numerical methods, useful for problems where pure symbolic integration fails or is inefficient.

tools.name: diffeqpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for DifferentialEquations.jl
tools.detailed_description: Allows Python users to utilize the high-performance solvers from Julia's DifferentialEquations.jl directly within Python scripts.

tools.name: diffeqr
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for DifferentialEquations.jl
tools.detailed_description: Allows R users to utilize the high-performance solvers from Julia's DifferentialEquations.jl directly within R scripts.

tools.name: numericalnim
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical methods library for Nim
tools.detailed_description: A collection of numerical methods implemented in the Nim programming language, including integration, interpolation, and optimization routines.

tools.name: XFEM_Fracture2D
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB program for 2D fracture propagation using XFEM
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB program for solving fracture problems involving arbitrary multiple crack propagations in a 2D linear-elastic solid using the Extended Finite Element Method (XFEM).

tools.name: iFeature
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for protein/peptide sequence feature extraction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python-based toolkit for generating various numerical feature representation schemes from protein or peptide sequences, including feature clustering, selection, and dimensionality reduction.

tools.name: Uintah
tools.one_line_profile: Asynchronous Many Task Framework for multi-physics simulation
tools.detailed_description: A set of libraries and applications for simulating and analyzing complex chemical and physical reactions modeled by partial differential equations on structured adaptive grids using massive parallelism.

tools.name: extensisq
tools.one_line_profile: Extension methods for scipy.integrate.solve_ivp
tools.detailed_description: Extends scipy.integrate with various additional methods for solving initial value problems (IVP), enhancing the capabilities of Python's scientific ecosystem.

tools.name: odeintw
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for scipy.integrate.odeint handling complex/matrix equations
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper around scipy.integrate.odeint that enables it to handle complex-valued and matrix-valued differential equations seamlessly.

tools.name: ccmath
tools.one_line_profile: C mathematics library for numerical analysis
tools.detailed_description: A mathematics library coded in C containing functions for linear algebra, numerical integration, geometry, curve fitting, roots, optimization, Fourier analysis, and statistics.

tools.name: PyDEns
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for solving ODEs and PDEs using neural networks
tools.detailed_description: PyDEns is a Python framework that utilizes neural networks to solve Ordinary and Partial Differential Equations (ODEs & PDEs). It enables the implementation of physics-informed neural network (PINN) approaches for solving differential equations without mesh generation.

tools.name: Lis
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel library of iterative solvers for linear systems
tools.detailed_description: Lis (Library of Iterative Solvers) is a parallel software library designed to solve discretized linear equations and eigenvalue problems arising from numerical solutions of partial differential equations (PDEs). It supports various iterative methods and preconditioners.

tools.name: pycvodes
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the CVODES solver from SUNDIALS
tools.detailed_description: pycvodes provides a Python interface to the CVODES solver from the SUNDIALS suite, enabling the integration of ordinary differential equations (ODEs) with sensitivity analysis capabilities. It is designed for stiff and non-stiff problems.

tools.name: pyodesys
tools.one_line_profile: Straightforward numerical integration of ODE systems
tools.detailed_description: pyodesys is a Python library that simplifies the numerical integration of systems of ordinary differential equations (ODEs). It provides a unified interface to various solvers (including those from scipy, gsl, and sundials) and supports symbolic representation of equations.

tools.name: TorchPhysics
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for solving partial differential equations
tools.detailed_description: TorchPhysics is a Python library based on PyTorch for solving partial differential equations (PDEs) using deep learning methods. It supports Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) and other data-driven approaches for scientific computing.

tools.name: ImplicitAD.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Adjoint differentiation for implicit functions and solvers
tools.detailed_description: ImplicitAD.jl is a Julia package that automates steady and unsteady adjoint calculations for implicit functions and ODE solvers. It enables automatic differentiation (AD) around implicit solvers without propagating AD through the iterative process, suitable for optimization and sensitivity analysis.

tools.name: CasADi
tools.one_line_profile: Symbolic framework for numeric optimization and automatic differentiation
tools.detailed_description: CasADi is a symbolic framework for numeric optimization that implements automatic differentiation in forward and reverse modes on sparse matrix-valued computational graphs. It is widely used for optimal control, algorithmic differentiation, and interfacing with solvers like SUNDIALS and IPOPT.

tools.name: pytorch-blender
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of Blender into PyTorch data pipelines
tools.detailed_description: pytorch-blender enables the seamless integration of Blender's rendering capabilities into PyTorch data pipelines. It allows for real-time, distributed generation of synthetic visual data for scientific machine learning and computer vision tasks.

tools.name: Russell
tools.one_line_profile: Rust Scientific Library for ODE/DAE solving and linear algebra
tools.detailed_description: Russell is a scientific library written in Rust that provides solvers for Ordinary Differential Equations (ODE) and Differential Algebraic Equations (DAE) using Runge-Kutta methods. It also includes modules for linear algebra, sparse solvers, and special functions.

tools.name: dae-cpp
tools.one_line_profile: Header-only C++ DAE system solver
tools.detailed_description: dae-cpp is a lightweight, header-only C++ library designed for solving Differential Algebraic Equation (DAE) systems. It provides a simple interface for integrating DAEs in C++ applications.

tools.name: MPS
tools.one_line_profile: 3D fluid dynamics solver using Moving Particle Semi-implicit method
tools.detailed_description: MPS is a 3D fluid dynamics solver that implements the Moving Particle Semi-implicit (MPS) method. It utilizes OpenMP for parallelization to simulate fluid flows.

tools.name: Meta.Numerics
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced numerical computing library for .NET
tools.detailed_description: Meta.Numerics is a library for advanced numerical computing on the .NET platform. It offers an object-oriented API for statistical analysis, advanced functions, Fourier transforms, numerical integration, optimization, and matrix algebra.

tools.name: Deepnote
tools.one_line_profile: AI-first collaborative data notebook platform
tools.detailed_description: Deepnote is a collaborative data science platform that provides a Jupyter-compatible notebook environment with built-in AI assistance, real-time collaboration, and data integrations. It serves as a workspace for scientific data analysis and modeling.

tools.name: numgrid
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical integration grid library for molecular DFT calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library providing numerical integration grids specifically designed for molecules, commonly used in Density Functional Theory (DFT) and other quantum chemistry computations.

tools.name: qontrol
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum optimal control library using JAX and diffrax
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for quantum optimal control simulations, leveraging JAX for automatic differentiation and diffrax for differential equation solving.

tools.name: PyCahnHilliard
tools.one_line_profile: Solver for Cahn-Hilliard equation using implicit pseudospectral method
tools.detailed_description: A Python script/tool designed to solve the Cahn-Hilliard equation, which describes the process of phase separation, using an implicit pseudospectral numerical method.

tools.name: torchquad
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated numerical integration library for PyTorch/JAX/TF
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing numerical integration in arbitrary dimensions on GPUs, supporting multiple backends like PyTorch, TensorFlow, and JAX. Developed by ESA.

tools.name: SRNN
tools.one_line_profile: Symplectic Recurrent Neural Networks for physical dynamics modeling
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning system from Facebook Research that captures the dynamics of physical systems using Hamiltonian modeling and symplectic integration.

tools.name: fdaPDE-core
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for PDE discretization and finite element analysis
tools.detailed_description: A C++ header-only library providing core functionalities for Partial Differential Equation discretization, computational geometry, and finite element analysis.

tools.name: Irksome
tools.one_line_profile: Implicit Runge-Kutta solvers for Firedrake
tools.detailed_description: A library providing solvers for Implicit Runge-Kutta methods, designed to work within the Firedrake finite element framework for solving PDEs.

tools.name: Runge-Kutta-Fehlberg
tools.one_line_profile: RKF7(8) numerical method implementation for celestial dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of the Runge-Kutta-Fehlberg 7(8) order numerical method, specifically targeted at solving problems in celestial dynamics.

tools.name: ParserNG
tools.one_line_profile: Java math expression parser and numerical solver
tools.detailed_description: A Java library for parsing and evaluating mathematical expressions, capable of performing symbolic differentiation, numerical integration, and equation solving.

tools.name: Cuba.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Multidimensional numerical integration library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library wrapping the Cuba C library, providing four independent algorithms (Vegas, Suave, Divonne, Cuhre) for multidimensional numerical integration.

tools.name: torchsde
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable SDE solvers with GPU support
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing differentiable solvers for Stochastic Differential Equations (SDEs) with GPU support and efficient sensitivity analysis, integrated with PyTorch.

tools.name: flexisol
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark and analysis tool for implicit solvation models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for evaluating and benchmarking implicit solvation models on large and conformationally flexible molecules, developed by the Grimme Lab.

tools.name: PyPDE
tools.one_line_profile: Solver for hyperbolic and parabolic PDE systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python/C++ library for solving systems of hyperbolic or parabolic Partial Differential Equations, capable of handling stiff source terms and non-conservative components.

tools.name: odeint-v2
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for solving ordinary differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive C++ library for solving ordinary differential equations, providing various steppers and integration algorithms. (Related to Boost.Numeric.Odeint).

tools.name: odespy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface to a large collection of ODE solvers
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a unified interface to a wide range of ODE solvers implemented in Fortran, C, and Python, facilitating easy access and comparison of different methods.

tools.name: hyperdeal
tools.one_line_profile: Matrix-free finite-element library for high-dimensional PDEs
tools.detailed_description: An efficient, matrix-free finite-element library designed for solving high-dimensional partial differential equations.

tools.name: sundialsml
tools.one_line_profile: OCaml interface to the Sundials suite of numeric solvers
tools.detailed_description: An OCaml interface to the Sundials suite, providing access to robust nonlinear and differential/algebraic equation solvers. Maintained by INRIA.

tools.name: SIMPLE
tools.one_line_profile: Symplectic Integration Methods for Particle Loss Estimation
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran code implementing symplectic integration methods specifically for estimating particle loss in plasma physics contexts.

tools.name: stiff3
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive solver for stiff systems of ODEs
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran library implementing a semi-implicit Runge-Kutta method of third order for solving stiff systems of ordinary differential equations adaptively.

tools.name: easy-neural-ode
tools.one_line_profile: Code for learning differential equations that are easy to solve
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a method to learn Neural ODEs that are computationally easier to solve, improving inference speed and stability.

tools.name: dop853
tools.one_line_profile: Modern Fortran implementation of Hairer's DOP853 ODE solver
tools.detailed_description: A modern Fortran refactoring of the classic DOP853 explicit Runge-Kutta method (order 8) for solving non-stiff differential equations.

tools.name: odepack
tools.one_line_profile: Modern Fortran refactoring of the ODEPACK library
tools.detailed_description: A work-in-progress project to refactor and modernize the classic ODEPACK library for solving ordinary differential equations in Fortran.

tools.name: rklib
tools.one_line_profile: Fixed and variable-step Runge-Kutta solvers in Modern Fortran
tools.detailed_description: A library providing a collection of fixed and variable-step Runge-Kutta solvers implemented in modern Fortran for numerical integration.

tools.name: RKSymFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Runge-Kutta based symmetry-preserving solver extension for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A solver module for the OpenFOAM CFD toolbox that implements Runge-Kutta based symmetry-preserving integration methods, designed for fluid dynamics simulations requiring geometric conservation properties.

tools.name: SimulationLogs.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Logging and scoping utility for DifferentialEquations.jl simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library providing signal logging and variable scoping capabilities specifically designed for simulations running within the DifferentialEquations.jl ecosystem, facilitating data extraction and monitoring.

tools.name: springs-integration-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable numerical integration for mass-spring systems
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library implementing numerical integration methods specifically for mass-spring systems, leveraging automatic differentiation for physics-based machine learning tasks.

tools.name: RK-Opt
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB package for the design and optimization of Runge-Kutta methods
tools.detailed_description: A specialized MATLAB package used for the design, optimization, and analysis of numerical ODE solvers, particularly Runge-Kutta methods. It allows researchers to find coefficients that maximize stability or accuracy properties.

tools.name: NodePy
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical ODE solver analysis and testing framework
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for designing, analyzing, and testing numerical methods for initial value ODEs. It supports object-oriented representation of RK, linear multistep, and other methods to study their stability and convergence properties.

tools.name: odex-js
tools.one_line_profile: Bulirsch-Stoer ODE integrator for JavaScript
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript implementation of the Bulirsch-Stoer algorithm for solving systems of ordinary differential equations, suitable for web-based scientific visualizations and lightweight simulations.

tools.name: AMPE
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Mesh Phase-field Evolution solver
tools.detailed_description: A C++ code for simulating phase-field evolution using adaptive mesh refinement, developed at LLNL. It is used for modeling microstructure evolution in materials science.

tools.name: SUNDIALS
tools.one_line_profile: Suite of Nonlinear and Differential/Algebraic Equation Solvers
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive suite of advanced numerical solvers for ODEs, DAEs, and nonlinear equations. It includes packages like CVODE, IDA, and ARKODE, widely used in high-performance scientific computing.

tools.name: ODEInterface.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia interface for Fortran ODE solvers
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing an interface to classic Fortran ODE solvers (like ODEPACK, RADAU), allowing Julia users to leverage established numerical routines for solving differential equations.

tools.name: PyPLANE
tools.one_line_profile: Phase plane analysis and ODE solving tool
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python application designed to replace traditional tools like DFIELD and PPLANE. It provides a GUI for solving systems of ODEs and visualizing their phase planes, useful for education and qualitative analysis.

tools.name: DoubleExponentialFormulas.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Double exponential integration formulas for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library implementing the double exponential (DE) formula for high-precision 1D numerical integration, suitable for functions with end-point singularities.

tools.name: libode
tools.one_line_profile: Dependency-free C++ class library for high-order ODE solvers
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, dependency-free C++ library providing classes for various high-order ordinary differential equation solvers, designed for ease of integration into other C++ scientific applications.

tools.name: torchode
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel ODE solver for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library providing parallel ODE solvers with GPU support and automatic differentiation capabilities, designed for Neural ODEs and physics-informed machine learning tasks.

tools.name: diffsol
tools.one_line_profile: ODE solver library in Rust
tools.detailed_description: A modern Rust library for solving ordinary differential equations, providing efficient and type-safe implementations of numerical integration methods.

tools.name: WaveBEM
tools.one_line_profile: Unsteady nonlinear potential flow solver for ship-wave interaction simulations
tools.detailed_description: A C++ solver based on the Boundary Element Method (BEM) for simulating unsteady nonlinear potential flows, specifically designed for analyzing ship-wave interactions in fluid dynamics.

tools.name: Math.NET Numerics
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive numerical computing library for .NET framework
tools.detailed_description: A foundational numerical library for .NET, providing methods for linear algebra, statistics, integration, interpolation, and differential equation solving, serving as a scientific computing base for C# and F#.

tools.name: sdeint
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for numerical integration of Stochastic Differential Equations (SDEs)
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python library providing algorithms for integrating Ito or Stratonovich stochastic differential equations, supporting simple SDE systems simulation.

tools.name: dde_solver
tools.one_line_profile: C++ bindings for the Fortran DDE_SOLVER library for delay differential equations
tools.detailed_description: Provides C/C++ interfaces to the classic Fortran DDE_SOLVER by Shampine and Thompson, enabling the solution of delay differential equations in modern C++ workflows. Maintained by Metrum Research Group.

tools.name: swm
tools.one_line_profile: Shallow water equations solver using finite differences
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based solver for shallow water equations implementing Arakawa C-grid and 4th order Runge-Kutta time integration, designed for oceanographic and atmospheric fluid dynamics simulations.

tools.name: aither
tools.one_line_profile: 3D block-structured Navier-Stokes solver
tools.detailed_description: A computational fluid dynamics (CFD) solver for the Navier-Stokes equations, supporting 3D block-structured grids and both explicit and implicit time integration schemes.

tools.name: Modelica_LinearSystems2
tools.one_line_profile: Modelica library for linear system analysis and operations
tools.detailed_description: An official Modelica library providing data structures and operations for linear time-invariant differential and difference equation systems, facilitating control system analysis and simulation.

tools.name: Assimulo
tools.one_line_profile: High-level Python package for solving ordinary differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A simulation package that wraps high-performance ODE/DAE solvers (like SUNDIALS/IDA/CVODE) into a Python interface, supporting explicit, implicit, and DAE systems with event handling.

tools.name: qmc
tools.one_line_profile: Quasi-Monte-Carlo Integrator Library with CUDA Support
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance library for multi-dimensional numerical integration using Quasi-Monte Carlo methods, featuring CUDA acceleration. Developed by Max Planck Institute for Physics.

tools.name: Integrate
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight numerical integration library for Rust
tools.detailed_description: A Rust crate providing standard numerical integration algorithms (e.g., Simpson's rule, Trapezoidal rule) for scientific computing applications in the Rust ecosystem.

tools.name: ProbNumDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic numerical ODE solvers for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library implementing probabilistic numerical methods for solving differential equations, treating the solution as a Bayesian inference problem to quantify numerical uncertainty.

tools.name: PyPartMC
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for the PartMC particle-resolved Monte Carlo model
tools.detailed_description: Provides Python bindings and a C++ interface for PartMC, a particle-resolved Monte Carlo code used in atmospheric science to simulate aerosol dynamics and chemistry.

tools.name: owl_ode
tools.one_line_profile: Differential equation solvers for the Owl scientific computing library
tools.detailed_description: An OCaml library providing a suite of numerical solvers for ordinary differential equations (ODEs), designed to integrate with the Owl scientific computing ecosystem.

tools.name: NIntegration.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Multidimensional numerical integration library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A pure Julia library focused on performing multidimensional numerical integration efficiently, serving as a utility for scientific computations requiring quadrature in multiple dimensions.

tools.name: diffrax
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable numerical differential equation solvers in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A powerful library for solving differential equations (ODEs, SDEs, CDEs) in JAX, supporting automatic differentiation, GPU acceleration, and integration with deep learning workflows.

tools.name: probdiffeq
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic differential equation solvers in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A JAX-based library providing probabilistic numerical solvers for differential equations, offering adaptive solvers with calibration and state-space model factorizations.

tools.name: fenics-adapter
tools.one_line_profile: preCICE adapter for FEniCS coupling
tools.detailed_description: An adapter allowing the FEniCS finite element solver to be coupled with other solvers via the preCICE coupling library, facilitating multi-physics simulations.

tools.name: FLINT
tools.one_line_profile: Fortran Library for numerical INTegration of differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A modern Fortran library providing solvers for ordinary differential equations, including Runge-Kutta and other integration schemes, designed for high-performance scientific computing.

tools.name: sunode
tools.one_line_profile: Fast ODE solver interface for PyMC
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that interfaces the SUNDIALS ODE solvers with PyMC, enabling fast gradient-based inference and Bayesian modeling of systems described by ordinary differential equations.

tools.name: SBML_odeSolver
tools.one_line_profile: C library for solving ODEs derived from SBML chemical reaction networks
tools.detailed_description: A C library designed for the symbolic and numerical analysis of systems of ordinary differential equations (ODEs) derived from chemical reaction networks encoded in the Systems Biology Markup Language (SBML).

tools.name: torchdiffeq
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable ODE solvers with GPU support for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A library providing differentiable ordinary differential equation (ODE) solvers implemented in PyTorch, enabling the integration of ODE solving into deep learning models (Neural ODEs) with O(1)-memory backpropagation.

tools.name: Spitfire
tools.one_line_profile: Library for tabulated chemistry models and solving differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A Python/C++ library developed by Sandia National Laboratories for constructing tabulated chemistry models and solving differential equations, particularly for combustion and reacting flow simulations.

tools.name: ode-rk4
tools.one_line_profile: Fourth Order Runge-Kutta integrator for JavaScript
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library for integrating systems of ordinary differential equations using the Fourth Order Runge-Kutta (RK-4) method, part of the scijs ecosystem.

tools.name: simulation
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript library for System Dynamics and Agent Based Modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Node.js and browser library for running simulations, supporting System Dynamics modeling, Differential Equation mathematical modeling, and Agent Based Modeling.

tools.name: sdepy
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical Integration of Ito Stochastic Differential Equations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for the numerical integration of Ito Stochastic Differential Equations (SDEs), providing tools for simulation and analysis of stochastic processes.

tools.name: liblsoda
tools.one_line_profile: Shared library for the LSODA ODE solver algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A C library implementation of the LSODA algorithm (Livermore Solver for Ordinary Differential Equations) for solving stiff and non-stiff systems of ODEs.

tools.name: quadpy
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical integration (quadrature, cubature) in Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for numerical integration (quadrature and cubature) in 1D, 2D, and higher dimensions, supporting various domains and schemes.

tools.name: alamo
tools.one_line_profile: Explicit and implicit solvers for solid mechanics with AMR
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library providing explicit and implicit solvers for solid mechanics problems, featuring Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR) capabilities.

tools.name: ode-solvers
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical methods to solve ODEs in Rust
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library implementing numerical methods for solving ordinary differential equations, including Runge-Kutta and other schemes.

tools.name: Stan Math Library
tools.one_line_profile: C++ template library for automatic differentiation and math functions
tools.detailed_description: The Stan Math Library is a C++ template library providing automatic differentiation (forward, reverse, and mixed modes) and a suite of mathematical functions for probabilistic modeling and equation solving.

tools.name: NumericalIntegration
tools.one_line_profile: C++ header-only library for numerical integration
tools.detailed_description: A precision-independent, header-only C++ library for performing numerical integration using various quadrature rules.

tools.name: eom
tools.one_line_profile: Configurable ODE/PDE solver in Rust
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library providing configurable solvers for ordinary and partial differential equations (ODE/PDE), designed for scientific computing.

tools.name: Multiphysics
tools.one_line_profile: DG-FEM Runge-Kutta solver for hyperbolic systems
tools.detailed_description: A C++ solver implementing Discontinuous Galerkin Finite Element Method (DG-FEM) with Runge-Kutta time integration for hyperbolic systems of equations, such as shallow water equations.

tools.name: grid
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for numerical operations on molecular grids
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing numerical integration, interpolation, and differentiation on grids, specifically designed for molecular physics and chemistry applications.

tools.name: DPM-Solver-v3
tools.one_line_profile: Improved Diffusion ODE Solver with Empirical Model Statistics
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of DPM-Solver-v3, a fast and high-quality ODE solver for diffusion models, optimizing the sampling process in generative AI.

tools.name: Sundial
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation models for time series analysis
tools.detailed_description: A family of highly capable foundation models for time series analysis, providing tools for forecasting, imputation, and anomaly detection in scientific and industrial data.

tools.name: necpp
tools.one_line_profile: C++ rewrite of the Numerical Electromagnetics Code (NEC-2)
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library and tool for analyzing the radiating and scattering properties of antennas and structures, based on the classic NEC-2 algorithm with performance improvements.

tools.name: Trixi.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive high-order numerical simulation framework for conservation laws
tools.detailed_description: Trixi.jl is a numerical simulation framework for hyperbolic conservation laws. It supports adaptive mesh refinement, high-order methods (Discontinuous Galerkin), and integrates with the Julia SciML ecosystem for time integration.

tools.name: integrator
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical integrator for non-stiff ordinary differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A numerical integrator written in Elixir for the solution of sets of non-stiff ordinary differential equations (ODEs), providing a functional programming approach to numerical methods.

tools.name: ahmed
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical matrix library for elliptic differential equations
tools.detailed_description: AHMED (Another Hierarchical Matrix Library) is a C++ software library implementing hierarchical matrices (H-matrices) for solving elliptic differential equations efficiently.

tools.name: conformalForecast
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for multistep-ahead time series conformal prediction
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing methods and tools for multistep-ahead time series conformal prediction, enabling uncertainty quantification in forecasting.

tools.name: RcppNumerical
tools.one_line_profile: Rcpp integration for numerical computing libraries
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Rcpp bindings for numerical computing libraries, specifically providing interfaces for numerical integration and L-BFGS-B optimization within R.
